name: PATTERNS UNKNOWN
description:
Game made for CGA JAM 2017

We used this as an excuse to make an early demo for a game we will later turn into a mobile release. Using the themes repeated history and always faster as you will need to continue matching / memorizing the shapes to match them quickly enough before the timer runs out. 

How to play:

After the game is started you will have a certain amount of seconds to memorize the pattern

Drag shapes from the bottom to the dots (Can also swap shapes if one is in the wrong position)

In this demo complete all three phases to win the game.
